import { prisma } from '@/lib/prisma'
import { nanoid } from 'nanoid'

// é‚€è¯·ç ç±»å‹æšä¸¾
export enum InviteCodeType {

  STANDARD = 'STANDARD'
}

// é‚€è¯·ç é…ç½®
export interface InviteCodeConfig {

// æ ¹æ®ç±»å‹è·å–é»˜è®¤é…ç½®
export function getDefaultConfigByType(type: InviteCodeType): Partial<InviteCodeConfig> {
  switch (type) {
    case InviteCodeType.ADMIN:
      return {
        maxUses: 1,
        description: 'ç®¡ç†å‘˜ä¸“ç”¨é‚€è¯·ç  - æ‹¥æœ‰æ‰€æœ‰æƒé™',
        restrictions: {
          maxUsers: 1
        }
      }
    case InviteCodeType.PREMIUM_CODER:
      return {
        maxUses: 10,
        description: 'é«˜çº§å¼€å‘è€…é‚€è¯·ç  - äº«å—ä¸“å±åŠŸèƒ½',
        restrictions: {
          maxUsers: 10
        }
      }
    case InviteCodeType.CODER:
      return {
        maxUses: 50,
        description: 'å¼€å‘è€…é‚€è¯·ç  - å¯åˆ†äº«æŠ€èƒ½è·å¾—æ”¶ç›Š'
      }
    case InviteCodeType.LEARNER:
      return {
        maxUses: 100,
        description: 'å­¦ä¹ è€…é‚€è¯·ç  - å¼€å§‹æ‚¨çš„å­¦ä¹ ä¹‹æ—…'
      }
    case InviteCodeType.STANDARD:
    default:

// ç”Ÿæˆé‚€è¯·ç 
export async function generateInviteCode(
  createdById: string, 
  config: InviteCodeConfig = {}
): Promise<string> {
  const type = config.type || InviteCodeType.STANDARD
  const defaultConfig = getDefaultConfigByType(type)
  const finalConfig = { ...defaultConfig, ...config }
  
  const code = nanoid(12).toUpperCase() // ç”Ÿæˆ12ä½å¤§å†™éšæœºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
  
  await prisma.inviteCode.create({
    data: {
      code,
      type,
      createdById,
      maxUses: finalConfig.maxUses || 1,
      expiresAt: finalConfig.expiresAt,
      description: finalConfig.description,
      restrictions: finalConfig.restrictions ? JSON.stringify(finalConfig.restrictions) : null,
    }
  })
  
  return code
}

// éªŒè¯é‚€è¯·ç 
export async function validateInviteCode(
  code: string, 
  userEmail?: string
): Promise<{ valid: boolean; message?: string; inviteCodeId?: string; type?: string }> {
  const inviteCode = await prisma.inviteCode.findUnique({
    where: { code: code.toUpperCase() },
    include: { inviteUses: true }
  })
  
  if (!inviteCode) {
    return { valid: false, message: 'é‚€è¯·ç ä¸å­˜åœ¨' }
  }
  
  if (!inviteCode.isActive) {
    return { valid: false, message: 'é‚€è¯·ç å·²è¢«ç¦ç”¨' }
  }
  
  if (inviteCode.expiresAt && inviteCode.expiresAt < new Date()) {
    return { valid: false, message: 'é‚€è¯·ç å·²è¿‡æœŸ' }
  }
  
  if (inviteCode.usedCount >= inviteCode.maxUses) {
    return { valid: false, message: 'é‚€è¯·ç ä½¿ç”¨æ¬¡æ•°å·²è¾¾ä¸Šé™' }
  }
  
  // æ£€æŸ¥é™åˆ¶æ¡ä»¶
  if (inviteCode.restrictions && userEmail) {
    const restrictions = JSON.parse(inviteCode.restrictions)
    
    if (restrictions.emailDomains) {
      const emailDomain = '@' + userEmail.split('@')[1]
      if (!restrictions.emailDomains.includes(emailDomain)) {
        return { valid: false, message: 'æ‚¨çš„é‚®ç®±åŸŸåä¸åœ¨é‚€è¯·èŒƒå›´å†…' }
      }
    }
    
    if (restrictions.maxUsers) {
      if (inviteCode.usedCount >= restrictions.maxUsers) {
        return { valid: false, message: 'æ­¤é‚€è¯·ç ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡å·²è¾¾ä¸Šé™' }
      }
    }
  }
  
  return { 
    valid: true, 
    inviteCodeId: inviteCode.id,
    type: inviteCode.type 
  }
}

  userAgent?: string
): Promise<{ success: boolean; message?: string; inviteType?: string }> {
  const validation = await validateInviteCode(code)
  
  if (!validation.valid) {
    return { success: false, message: validation.message }
  }
  
  try {
    const result = await prisma.$transaction(async (tx) => {
      // è®°å½•ä½¿ç”¨
      await tx.inviteCodeUse.create({
        data: {
          inviteCodeId: validation.inviteCodeId!,
          userId,
          ipAddress,
          userAgent,
        }
      })
      
      // å¢åŠ ä½¿ç”¨è®¡æ•°
      await tx.inviteCode.update({
        where: { id: validation.inviteCodeId! },
        data: { usedCount: { increment: 1 } }
      })
      
      // è·å–é‚€è¯·ç ä¿¡æ¯
      const inviteCode = await tx.inviteCode.findUnique({
        where: { id: validation.inviteCodeId! }
      })
      
      // æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·é‚€è¯·ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬é‚€è¯·ç±»å‹
      await tx.user.update({
        where: { id: userId },
        data: {
          invitedById: inviteCode!.createdById,
          inviteCode: code.toUpperCase(),
          inviteType: inviteCode!.type,
          isVerified: true, // ä½¿ç”¨é‚€è¯·ç çš„ç”¨æˆ·è‡ªåŠ¨éªŒè¯
        }
      })
      
      return { inviteType: inviteCode!.type }
    })
    
    return { 
      success: true, 
      inviteType: result.inviteType 
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('é‚€è¯·ç ä½¿ç”¨å¤±è´¥:', error)
    return { success: false, message: 'é‚€è¯·ç ä½¿ç”¨å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•' }
  }
}

// æ‰¹é‡ç”ŸæˆæŒ‡å®šç±»å‹çš„é‚€è¯·ç 
export async function generateMultipleInviteCodes(
  createdById: string,
  type: InviteCodeType,
  count: number,
  config: Omit<InviteCodeConfig, 'type'> = {}
): Promise<string[]> {
  const codes: string[] = []
  const defaultConfig = getDefaultConfigByType(type)
  const finalConfig = { ...defaultConfig, ...config, type }
  
  for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
    const code = await generateInviteCode(createdById, finalConfig)
    codes.push(code)
  }
  
  return codes
}

```typescript
import { prisma } from '@/lib/prisma'
import { nanoid } from 'nanoid'

// é‚€è¯·ç é…ç½®
export interface InviteCodeConfig {
  maxUses?: number
  expiresAt?: Date
  restrictions?: {
    emailDomains?: string[]
    maxUsers?: number
    requiredRole?: string
  }
}

// ç”Ÿæˆé‚€è¯·ç 
export async function generateInviteCode(
  createdById: string, 
  config: InviteCodeConfig = {}
): Promise<string> {
  const code = nanoid(12) // ç”Ÿæˆ12ä½éšæœºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
  
  await prisma.inviteCode.create({
    data: {
      code,
      createdById,
      maxUses: config.maxUses || 1,
      expiresAt: config.expiresAt,
      restrictions: config.restrictions ? JSON.stringify(config.restrictions) : null,
    }
  })
  
  return code
}

// éªŒè¯é‚€è¯·ç 
export async function validateInviteCode(
  code: string, 
  userEmail?: string
): Promise<{ valid: boolean; message?: string; inviteCodeId?: string }> {
  const inviteCode = await prisma.inviteCode.findUnique({
    where: { code },
    include: { inviteUses: true }
  })
  
  if (!inviteCode) {
    return { valid: false, message: 'é‚€è¯·ç ä¸å­˜åœ¨' }
  }
  
  if (!inviteCode.isActive) {
    return { valid: false, message: 'é‚€è¯·ç å·²è¢«ç¦ç”¨' }
  }
  
  if (inviteCode.expiresAt && inviteCode.expiresAt < new Date()) {
    return { valid: false, message: 'é‚€è¯·ç å·²è¿‡æœŸ' }
  }
  
  if (inviteCode.usedCount >= inviteCode.maxUses) {
    return { valid: false, message: 'é‚€è¯·ç ä½¿ç”¨æ¬¡æ•°å·²è¾¾ä¸Šé™' }
  }
  
  // æ£€æŸ¥é™åˆ¶æ¡ä»¶
  if (inviteCode.restrictions && userEmail) {
    const restrictions = JSON.parse(inviteCode.restrictions)
    
    if (restrictions.emailDomains) {
      const emailDomain = '@' + userEmail.split('@')[1]
      if (!restrictions.emailDomains.includes(emailDomain)) {
        return { valid: false, message: 'æ‚¨çš„é‚®ç®±åŸŸåä¸åœ¨é‚€è¯·èŒƒå›´å†…' }
      }
    }
    
    if (restrictions.maxUsers) {
      if (inviteCode.usedCount >= restrictions.maxUsers) {
        return { valid: false, message: 'æ­¤é‚€è¯·ç ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡å·²è¾¾ä¸Šé™' }
      }
    }
  }
  
  return { valid: true, inviteCodeId: inviteCode.id }
}

// ä½¿ç”¨é‚€è¯·ç 
export async function useInviteCode(
  code: string, 
  userId: string, 
  ipAddress?: string, 
  userAgent?: string
): Promise<{ success: boolean; message?: string }> {
  const validation = await validateInviteCode(code)
  
  if (!validation.valid) {
    return { success: false, message: validation.message }
  }
  
  try {
    await prisma.$transaction(async (tx) => {
      // è®°å½•ä½¿ç”¨
      await tx.inviteCodeUse.create({
        data: {
          inviteCodeId: validation.inviteCodeId!,
          userId,
          ipAddress,
          userAgent,
        }
      })
      
      // å¢åŠ ä½¿ç”¨è®¡æ•°
      await tx.inviteCode.update({
        where: { id: validation.inviteCodeId! },
        data: { usedCount: { increment: 1 } }
      })
      
      // æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·é‚€è¯·ä¿¡æ¯
      const inviteCode = await tx.inviteCode.findUnique({
        where: { id: validation.inviteCodeId! }
      })
      
      await tx.user.update({
        where: { id: userId },
        data: {
          invitedById: inviteCode!.createdById,
          inviteCode: code,
          isVerified: true, // ä½¿ç”¨é‚€è¯·ç çš„ç”¨æˆ·è‡ªåŠ¨éªŒè¯
        }
      })
    })
    
    return { success: true }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('é‚€è¯·ç ä½¿ç”¨å¤±è´¥:', error)
    return { success: false, message: 'é‚€è¯·ç ä½¿ç”¨å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•' }
  }
}

"use client"

import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'

interface LoadingScreenProps {
  onComplete?: () => void
  duration?: number
}

export default function LoadingScreen({ onComplete, duration = 3000 }: LoadingScreenProps) {
  const [progress, setProgress] = useState(0)
  const [logoScale, setLogoScale] = useState(1)

  useEffect(() => {
    // Progress animation
    const progressInterval = setInterval(() => {
      setProgress(prev => {
        if (prev >= 100) {
          clearInterval(progressInterval)
          if (onComplete) {
            setTimeout(onComplete, 500)
          }
          return 100
        }
        return prev + 2
      })
    }, duration / 50)

    // Logo pulsing animation
    const logoInterval = setInterval(() => {
      setLogoScale(prev => prev === 1 ? 1.05 : 1)
    }, 1000)

    return () => {
      clearInterval(progressInterval)
      clearInterval(logoInterval)
    }
  }, [duration, onComplete])

  return (
    <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black flex items-center justify-center">
      {/* Background elements similar to X */}
      <div className="absolute inset-0 overflow-hidden">
        {/* Subtle grid pattern */}
        <div className="absolute inset-0 opacity-5">
          <div
            className="w-full h-full"
            style={{
              backgroundImage: `
                linear-gradient(rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 1px, transparent 1px),
                linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 1px, transparent 1px)
              `,
              backgroundSize: '50px 50px'
            }}
          />
        </div>

        {/* Floating particles */}
        {Array.from({ length: 20 }).map((_, i) => (
          <div
            key={i}
            className="absolute w-1 h-1 bg-white rounded-full opacity-20"
            style={{
              left: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
              top: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
              animation: `float ${3 + Math.random() * 4}s ease-in-out infinite`,
              animationDelay: `${Math.random() * 2}s`
            }}
          />
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Main content */}
      <div className="relative z-10 flex flex-col items-center">
        {/* Logo */}
        <div 
          className="mb-8 transition-transform duration-1000 ease-in-out"
          style={{ transform: `scale(${logoScale})` }}
        >
          <div className="relative">
            {/* Main logo text */}
            <h1 className="text-6xl md:text-8xl font-bold text-white tracking-tight">
              gistfans
            </h1>
            
            {/* Subtle glow effect */}
            <div className="absolute inset-0 text-6xl md:text-8xl font-bold text-white opacity-30 blur-sm">
              gistfans
            </div>
            
            {/* Accent dot */}
            <div className="absolute -top-2 -right-2 w-3 h-3 bg-blue-500 rounded-full animate-pulse" />
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Loading indicator */}
        <div className="w-64 h-1 bg-gray-800 rounded-full overflow-hidden mb-4">
          <div 
            className="h-full bg-white transition-all duration-100 ease-out"
            style={{ width: `${progress}%` }}
          />
        </div>

        {/* Loading text */}
        <div className="text-gray-400 text-sm font-medium">
          Loading...
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Additional styling */}
      <style jsx>{`
        @keyframes float {
          0%, 100% {
            transform: translateY(0px) rotate(0deg);
            opacity: 0.2;
          }
          50% {
            transform: translateY(-20px) rotate(180deg);
            opacity: 0.4;
          }
        }
      `}</style>
    </div>
  )
}
```

  // æ‰‹åŠ¨ç¿»é¡µå‡½æ•°
  const goToNextScene = () => {
    if (currentScene < scenes.length - 1) {
      setCurrentScene(prev => prev + 1)
      setAnimationPhase(0)
    } else {
      onComplete()
    }
  }

  const goToPrevScene = () => {
    if (currentScene > 0) {
      setCurrentScene(prev => prev - 1)
      setAnimationPhase(0)
    }
  }

  const goToScene = (index: number) => {
    if (index >= 0 && index < scenes.length) {
      setCurrentScene(index)
      setAnimationPhase(0)
    }
  }

  // è‡ªåŠ¨æ’­æ”¾é€»è¾‘
  useEffect(() => {
    if (isAutoPlay) {
      const sceneTimer = setTimeout(() => {
        goToNextScene()
      }, scenes[currentScene].duration)
      
      setAutoTimer(sceneTimer)
      
      return () => {
        clearTimeout(sceneTimer)
      }
    } else {
      if (autoTimer) {
        clearTimeout(autoTimer)
        setAutoTimer(null)
      }
    }
  }, [currentScene, isAutoPlay])

  // åŠ¨ç”»é˜¶æ®µåˆ‡æ¢
  useEffect(() => {
    const phaseTimer = setInterval(() => {
      setAnimationPhase(prev => (prev + 1) % 4)
    }, 2000)

    return () => {
      clearInterval(phaseTimer)
    }
  }, [])

  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (event: KeyboardEvent) => {
      switch (event.key) {
        case 'ArrowLeft':
        case 'ArrowUp':
          event.preventDefault()
          setIsAutoPlay(false)
          goToPrevScene()
          break
        case 'ArrowRight':
        case 'ArrowDown':
        case ' ':
          event.preventDefault()
          setIsAutoPlay(false)
          goToNextScene()
          break
        case 'Home':
          event.preventDefault()
          setIsAutoPlay(false)
          goToScene(0)
          break
        case 'End':
          event.preventDefault()
          setIsAutoPlay(false)
          goToScene(scenes.length - 1)
          break
        case 'p':
        case 'P':
          event.preventDefault()
          setIsAutoPlay(prev => !prev)
          break
        case 'Escape':
          event.preventDefault()
          onComplete()
          break
      }
    }

    window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown)
    return () => {
      window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown)
    }
  }, [currentScene, scenes.length])
